title: Divine Lakshmi Temple Kangan: A Symphony of Tradition and Sparkle
materials: meticulously crafted with radiant diamonds (VVS clarity
brilliant cut). Features intricate filigree work and a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine. The central motif is crafted with detailed Nakshi work.
features: This exquisite Kangan boasts a traditional temple design, centered around a beautifully rendered Lakshmi motif. The filigree framework is embedded with glittering diamonds in a pave setting, creating an ornate floral pattern. The gold is finished with a special Hyderabadi polish, enhancing its warm, rich hue. The bangle opens from the side with a secure clasp.
occasions: and special family functions (Kudumba Karyaalu). A treasured heirloom for generations.
description: This Kangan is more than just jewelry; it's a piece of cultural heritage. The Lakshmi motif brings prosperity and good fortune, making it a meaningful gift for a bride or a cherished addition to any collection. The high-quality diamonds and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. It's a blend of the divine and the dazzling.
